original_text: They travelled to the east side of the valley to find grass for their sheep to eat. They went as far as Gedor.
korean_text: 그들이 그들의 양 떼를 위하여 목장을 구하고자 하여 골짜기 동쪽 그돌 지경에 이르러

sentences.original_text: They travelled to the east side of the valley
to find grass for their sheep to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 양이 먹을 풀을 찾기 위해

sentences.original_text: They went as far as Gedor
